author: Emily Orofino
title: 16 New Beauty Products You Need to Get Your Hands On in 2017
text:
New Beauty Products For Spring 2017 16 New Beauty Products You Need to Get Your Hands On in 2017 January 12, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 16 New Beauty Products You Need to Get Your Hands On in 2017 
With new resolutions and fresh starts, there are many reasons to look forward to January. But as beauty editors, we're particularly excited for all the new products making their debuts in 2017. Because the innovation in this crop of launches is quite special, we're sharing them as soon as we can. Read on for a luxurious (and affordable!) foam body wash, creamy powder highlighter, and more fantastic formulas. Related:
